DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess systemic disposition ASP1585 oral administration 14C-labeled drug healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Systemic Disposition ASP1585 After Administration 14C-labeled Drug
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive study drug 18 day radioactive dose study drug give Day 15 . Blood , urine feces collect confirm recovery radioactivity .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 32 kg/m2 , inclusive minimum body weight 45 kg Agrees sexual abstinence use highly effective form birth control include barrier method throughout study In good health History clinically significant disease History bowel obstruction , swallow disorder , gastrointestinal disorder , gastrointestinal surgery , actively bleed hemorrhoid , gastric/duodenal ulcer Irregular bowel habit ( < 1 bowel movement per day ) Clinically significant illness within 30 day Received drug medicine ( prescription overthecounter ) , include topical medication , complementary alternative medicine vitamin mineral supplement within 14 day prior first dose study drug Received investigational medication last 30 day 5 halflives , whichever longer , prior screen Consumes > 10 unit alcohol per week history alcoholism drug/chemical abuse within past 2 year Smokes cigarettes nicotinecontaining product Anticipates inability abstain alcohol use 48 hour prior first dose study drug grapefruit , Seville oranges , star fruit product contain item 72 hour prior first dose study drug end study Positive drug alcohol screen Screening Day 1 Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) gammaglutamyl transferase ( GGT ) value > 2x upper limit normal Screening Day 1 Known positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis A , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Unwilling unable swallow large number capsule Significant blood loss , donate one unit blood , receive transfusion blood blood product within 60 day donate plasma within 7 day prior Day 1 Known cumulative radiation exposure > 5 rem whole body , active blood forming organ , ocular lens , gonad , > 15 rem organ Has nuclear medicine procedure , compute tomography scan , significant xrays ( dental ) within past 12 month , receive radiolabeled material within last 6 month , significant occupational radiation exposure Has participate radiolabled study within last 6 month participate one radiolabeled study within last 12 month
